IRS990.Description: Educational expenses for approximately 3,600 students incurred in providing post secondary academic instruction & support, student services, residential living and in the awarding of scholarships.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part XIII, Line 4b: Other revenue amounts included on 990 but not included in F/S
Part XIII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Loss on extinguishment of bonds $110652 Loss on impaired asset $801174

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part XII, Line 4b: Other revenue amounts included on 990 but not included in F/S
Part XI, Line 8: Other Changes in Net Assets or Fund Balances
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Equity method - Income from sub $629940 Rounding $3 Loss on extinguishment of debt $ -110652 Loss on Impairment of asset - property $ -801174

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Endowment funds are held in perpetuity and the income is to be spent based on the donors intent which primarily are for scholarships.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: 1 - Resolution of governing board.2 - All publications and announcements include policy statements.3 - Part of all announcements of courses being offered.
IRS990ScheduleE.GovtFinancialAidExplanation: Husson College receives various government grants among them are:SEOG GrantsCollege work study GrantsNurse Practitioner GrantsAdvanced Nursing Education GrantsCapehart Center Grant

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: Part I, Line 1b: Reason for not following policy regarding payment provisions for expenses
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ASSESED AND DETERMINED THE APPROPRIATE LEVEL OF BENEFIT AFTER REVIEWING ITS POTENTIAL VALUE AND MARKET DATA ON COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: Part I, Line 1a: Relevant information in regards to selections on 1a.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Form 990 is available upon request. The governing documents, policies and financial statements are not disclosed to the general public.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Compensation undergoes a market review and is approved by the Board.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Annual Board of Directors disclosures are required and are scrutinized for potential conflicts

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Form 990 is reviewed by the Finance Committee prior to filing and the returns were made available to the full board for review.
